Class StringUtil

java.lang.Object

public class StringUtil
extends java.lang.Object

Contains string utility methods.

$Revision: $ $Modtime: $

Field Summary

          The source revision.
 
Method Summary
static java.lang.String capitalize(java.lang.String src)
          Returns a copy of the source string where the first letter of each work is capitalized.
static java.lang.String displayName(java.lang.String src)
          Give a instance variable name it returns a suitable column heading capitalizing the first letter and placing a space before all caps
static java.lang.String replaceString(java.lang.String source, java.lang.String oldStr, java.lang.String newStr)
          Return a copy of the specified string in which all occurences of one substring have been replaced with another.

Method Detail

capitalize

public static java.lang.String capitalize(java.lang.String src)
Returns a copy of the source string where the first letter of each work is capitalized.

replaceString

public static java.lang.String replaceString(java.lang.String source,
                                             java.lang.String oldStr,
                                             java.lang.String newStr)
Return a copy of the specified string in which all occurences of one substring have been replaced with another.

Parameters:
source - source string.
oldStr - old substring to be replaced.
newStr - new substring that replaces the old substring.
Returns:
String the result string.

displayName

public static java.lang.String displayName(java.lang.String src)
Give a instance variable name it returns a suitable column heading capitalizing the first letter and placing a space before all caps
